markdownRemark.html:
This is an outline for areas I plan to research, and how I plan to do the research.

Areas to research

  • Gamification

    • Octalysis Framework by Yu-Kai Chou
    • How to power motivation through Gamification?

  • Powering Motivation

    • Psychology behind motivation
    • Intrinsic & extrinsic motivation
  • Build community

  • How to get people hooked (or how to create a habit)

    • Hooked book by Nir Eyal

Gamification

Gamification will be an important area to research, as the app will rely on it to create hooks that keep people coming back to the app. I plan to research this by researching more into Ocyalysis (I already have some experience with it from work).
